name: B2P Communications Consulting
goal:
B2P Communications Consulting is a Germano-french communications and public affairs consultancy. We support companies, institutions and executives in all aspects of communication and their licence to operate.

B2P clients benefit from our national and European expertise to ensure that their voice is heard. Companies are a key element in political discussions and subject to the changing tide of public opinion. Keeping out of the public debate and not explaining the issues linked to one’s business is to leave the floor to others and risk company activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
